I am Alex The

I specialize in photography, film making, editing and akward cats noises.

View my work

I specialize

Photography and film making as well as creating digital masterpieces for your business or treasured memories.

Photography

Photography is my main focus and I promise the results will blow your mind. Visit the Work Section to see examples of my work and the areas i specialize in. Go ahead, I promise you will be stunned.

Video Shoot

Wether you want to promote your company with a publicity stunt or capture in action your most glorious hours, I can film and produce a masterpiece you will cherif for a lifetime.

Design & editing

You want to look 10 feet tall or see who will like your tinder profile with a 5g boob rack? Say no more, I can edit your Grand-Mother picture so she look sexier than JLo at Super Bowl LIV. Your welcome.

Interaction

Through every step of the process, I keep the communication channels open with my customers. I firmly believe discussion and feedback is the essential component for a sucessful Business Interaction.
